summary: In Do the Rat Thing, Prince Wazoo visits the palace and is attacked by a rat. In Bad Mood Rising, Aladdin visits the neighboring kingdom of Quirkistan. He soon realises that the King, Mamood, has driven the country into chaos.
cast: Val Bettin|Dan Castellaneta|Ed Gilbert|Ron Glass|Gilbert Gottfried|Linda Larkin|Tahj Mowry|Scott Weinger
director: Stars: Val Bettin, Dan Castellaneta, Ed Gilbert | See full cast & crew Â»
title: Jasmine's Wish
